entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 23. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
